original_text:
The lion killed enough for his cubs
    and strangled the prey for his mate,
filling his lairs with the kill
    and his dens with the prey.
korean_text: 수사자가 그 새끼를 위하여 먹이를 충분히 찢고 그의 암사자들을 위하여 움켜 사냥한 것으로 그 굴을 채웠고 찢은 것으로 그 구멍을 채웠었도다

sentences.original_text: The lion killed enough for his cubs
and strangled the prey for his mate
filling his lairs with the kill
and his dens with the prey
